message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $180 for it.
I understand that $200 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $190.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $170 for the product.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm now offering the product to you for $185.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $185 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $165 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a decent price. I'm now offering the product to you for $175.
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, but I still think $175 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $160 for the product.
I'm getting close to walking away from the deal, but I'm still willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $170.
I appreciate your last concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $155 for the product.
